text: Fussballclub Zürich is a professional football club in Zurich, Switzerland. The club was founded in 1896. It has won the Swiss Super League 13 times and the Swiss Cup ten times. The club plays its home games at the Letzigrund. FC Zürich is the only Swiss team to have reached the semi-finals of the European Cup more than once. This happened in 1964 and 1977. The women's club, FC Zürich Frauen, are competing in the Swiss Women's Super League. They are the most successful club in Switzerland with 22 championship titles and multiple Champions League participations. ==References== Category:1896 establishments in Switzerland Zurich Category:Organizations based in Zürich
title: FC Zürich
